body.name: Gaming Microphone, USB Computer Microphone for PC, Mac, PS4/5, Condenser Podcast Mic for Studio Recording, YouTube, Streaming, with Headphone Jack, Led Light, Mute, Gain, Noise Cancellation

features: Dynamic RGB lighting effect USB gaming microphone: Built-in 8 RGB lights to change various color modes by itself in a dynamic changing way. And you can choose to turn on/off the RGB light.

Noise cancellation podcast microphone: With the noise canceling function, the mic can effectively reduce the background noises, such as typing, clicking, outdoor noise, etc., making your sound clear and crisp.

Real-Time Monitor USB Computer Microphone: The desk gaming microphone's 3.5mm stereo headphone output provides direct, latency-free monitoring! It allows you to monitor the microphone input in realtime. 3-pole TRS and 4-pole TRRS headphones are supported.

Volume Gain: USB Recording microphone with additional volume knob itself has a louder output and is more sensitive,your voice would be heard well enough when gaming, live streaming, skyping or voice recording.

Quick Mute USB asmr microphone: A quick-mute button on the bottom is within easy reach, and you can instantly mute the mic even when you're concentrating on your game. When the microphone is muted, the RGB will be solid green; when the microphone is working, the RGB will resume gradient.

Plug and Play USB Microphone: Comes with a 78in(2m) USB cable, the microphone is plug and play, and no additional driver or software is required. Perfect for gaming, online lessons, live streaming, podcasting, recording, Zoom, Skype, YouTube video, etc.
What You Get: USB Condenser microphone with 2M USB cable*1, stand*1, user manual*1, packing box*1.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: MRSDY MRSDY V5 RGB USB Microphone brings you an unparalleled experience.

Previous page Dynamic RGB Lighting Create immersive gaming atmosphere. Mute or Working Mute: Green light Working: LED lights change dynamically Instant noise reduction With a separate noise reduction button, most noise can be eliminated. Next page 1 Dynamic RGB Lighting 2 Mute or Working 3 Instant noise reduction

Zero-Latency Monitoring Zero-delay stereo, let you be immersive when listening to music Volume Control The physical knob can quickly adjust to the right volume. Professional Sound Performance Professional sound gives you a more professional experience.

Plug and Play Compatible with a variety of devices, plug and play, no additional settings required. Does not take up space The base is only 3.55 inches in diameter, taking up no desktop space at all. MRSDY USB Microphone Choosing MRSDY computer microphone can bring you a perfect experience.

For Gaming Stereo monitoring is the key to winning the game. For Online Meetings A reliable microphone keeps meetings intact. For Online Shopping Using MRSDY microphone is beneficial for product video explanation. For Recording MRSDY USB microphone can capture every note clearly, ensuring the integrity of the recording. For Live Streaming Clear and clean sound can bring a good experience to the audience and is conducive to the growth of subscriptions.

Does this work on Windows 11 and Mac? Yes, this USB microphone can plug and play on Windows 11 to XP. Macs are also available. Can it be used together with PS4/PS5? Yes, it can be used with PS4/PS5. But it does not support Xbox. Can I turn off the microphone's LED light? Yes, there is an LED light control switch at the bottom of the USB gaming microphone, which can be turned on/off. Can I hear my voice and other people through monitoring headset jack? Yes, you will listen your sound in the real-time via the headphone jack. And this one is stereo. How to adjust the gain of the microphone? The USB microphone has a gain button. When connecting the microphone to the computer via a USB cable, you can adjust the gain at any time without distortion by turning the gain knob on the microphone.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best affordable mic
reviews.reviewText: This microphone is truly ideal, it is very good with picking up sound and is very relaxing with its color changing. I love this mic!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Little brother got this for Christmas and he said the voice quality is outstanding and he loves the lights.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is pretty good 👍🏻
reviews.reviewText: I really enjoy the quality catches everything that you say or any sound around you. Only thing I wish you didn't need headphones to hear everything.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good looking product
reviews.reviewText: Very nice microphone. Good price and it lights up

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great mic at great price!
reviews.reviewText: You really can't get a better mic for a better price. Bought my oldest son a much better (So I thought) mic for a much larger price tag and bought this one for my youngest son because I couldn't afford to buy them both the expensive one. So, I bought this one for my youngest and he couldn't be happier. His friends/teamates can hear him louder, better and clearer than the mic on his headphones. And when my sons compared them both, the inexpensive one to the more expensive one, they couldn't tell any difference! I should have bought them both the inexpensive one and saved a $100+. Would recommend and if you do purchase, you won't be disappointed! Happy Shopping!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not Great not bad
reviews.reviewText: The audio was good and I loved the design. The only issue I had is there was a nonstop buzzing sound. Whenever I touched my desk you were able to hear every single vibration and it sounded like a metal ball was bouncing around inside. Other then that it sounds great. Hoping mine was just damaged in a way I would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my boyfriend for christmas - it’s an awesome little thing! the colors are so cool and it works really well. he loves it, it’s very well priced, and made him happy!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My son loves this
reviews.reviewText: Very nice. LED lighting looks good and the audio sounds good. Great addition
